app.title: Blockchain Voting Platform
app.description: A secure, transparent, and decentralized electronic voting system built on blockchain technology.

home.title: Secure Blockchain Voting Platform
home.subtitle: A transparent, secure, and decentralized electronic voting system built on blockchain technology.

features.auth_text: Connect securely with your blockchain wallet. Your identity is verified using cryptographic proof, ensuring that only eligible voters can participate in elections.
features.voting_text: All votes are recorded on the blockchain, creating an immutable record that cannot be altered. Every vote is counted accurately, and the integrity of the election is preserved.
features.privacy_text: Your vote remains anonymous. While the blockchain records that you have voted, it does not reveal your specific choices, protecting your privacy.

participate.title: Participate in Elections
participate.text: Browse current and upcoming elections, review candidate information, and cast your vote securely using blockchain technology.

admin_section.title: Manage Elections
admin_section.text: Create new elections, manage candidates, monitor voting activity, and finalize election results.

results_section.title: Election Results
results_section.text: View verified election results that are cryptographically secured by the blockchain.

how_it_works.step4_text: Confirm your vote on the blockchain
